information

Class ColorChannelVectors

  • java.lang.Object
    • information.ColorChannelVectors

  • public class ColorChannelVectors
extends java.lang.Object
    The Class ColorChannelVectors. Collects data from colors separated to red, green and blue.

      • getKvalueAt

        public double getKvalueAt(int start_x,
                 int end_x)
        Counts and returns the sum of slopes of for red, green and blue vectors. A slope for every color vector is counted by: ( colorInt(at position end)- colorInt(at position start)) / (end - start). If single slope is negative -> multiplied with -1.
        Parameters:
        start_x - the position at start
        end_x - the the position at end
        Returns:
        the sum of slopes

        Returns:

        private void setOriginalDataAsSingleInt()
                                 throws java.lang.Exception
